400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax. Check your params and try it again.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

404.description: The server can not find the requested resource. Maybe endpoint is valid but the resource itself does not exist. Check the requested function or contact your system administrator.

get.summary: Return hash value by any message
get.description: Mathematical algorithm that maps data of arbitrary size (often called the "message") to a bit array of a fixed size (the "hash value", "hash", or "message digest")

parameters.name: hashtype
parameters.description: Please pass a hashtype (md5/sha256/sha512/rsa) and the message which you want to encode in the request body

post.summary: Uploads a file which you want to encrypt
post.description: Mathematical algorithm that maps data of arbitrary size (often called the "message") to a bit array of a fixed size (the "hash value", "hash", or "message digest")

parameters.name: hashtype
parameters.description: Please pass a hashtype (md5/sha256/sha512/rsa) and the message which you want to encode in the request body
